entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lillooet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:41 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lillooet 08:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow changing to rain this morning. Snow level rising to 600 metres near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Snow level 600 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 70 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
